product_name: PediaSure Health & Nutrition Drink Powder for Kids Growth - 1kg (Chocolate): Amazon.in: Amazon Pantry

reviews.review_body: After using 4 years, there was no increase in height, as claimed by company.

This is really a good product for kids, will recommend to buy, we could see visible speedy growth in last couple of months we been using, taste also kids love chocolate flavour. It's definitely better than regular Horlicks or Complan brands, although costly, but suggested by many pediatric docs these days.

reviews.review_title: Does it really work, not sure.
reviews.review_body: They say that you can see the difference in 90 days, I have been giving it to my son and still waiting to see the difference. These drinks are just for the name, nothing else. Better find cheap chocolate drink.
Very good product for kids. After drinking this with milk my kids has so much energy I sometime have to stop giving her this. Very good product specially if you kid does not eat food very well.

I got the new packing of Pediasure, white-coloured one. Though the picture on Amazon shows the old one, it was not the one I received. Also, the spoon was missing and the packets inside the box had no markings. I have a feeling that this is a duplicate product. Amazon needs to validated because I am going to get an old designed packed product from outside and then compare the two. The previous packs were working good on my kid but this one is not that effective, which makes my doubt even stronger but let me get an old designed pack from outside and then the picture will be clear. However, the missing spoon and the markings are just not right.

reviews.review_title: I have not tasted but should be good as kid loves it
reviews.review_body: My 2 year old loves taste of this. I was looking for something which can be given to 2 year old and only pediasure was product which specified that it can be given hence choose this. I have not tasted but should be good as kid loves it.

Delivered Vanilla Delight Flavour instead of Chocolate flavour. Realised after opening thereby could not return the item.  4 Star as this is a branded item and no issues with quality. Vendor needs to be careful in not doing such mischief.
I Dont see any improvement after feeding baby with pedicure powder but I fear my wife about trust in product. Better be natural. Feed cashew badam nuts that's it.
